content: I think important to punctuate that or highlight that because we do believe it's temporary, and we expect Big River Steel shipments, the third-party volumes in 2022 to 2021 record level. As you've seen us do in the past, though, we do like to look at project-specific financing that's long-dated cost to the extent that may be complementary to any of the projects that we're pursuing, particularly the three strategic projects that will generate $850 million of incremental cycle EBITDA beginning in 2024 or ramping in 2026.
